CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Priority) = $Label.CAS_Priorite_Eleve, IMAGE('/resource/drapeau_rouge','High',30,30), IF( TEXT(Priority) = $Label.CAS_Priorite_Moyen, IMAGE('/resource/drapeau_jaune','Medium',30,30), IF( TEXT(Priority) = $Label.CAS_Priorite_Faible, IMAGE('/resource/drapeau_vert','Low',30,30), "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Priorit√©
